nodes.text: Mab Kador, a young and eager male Aleena Podracer pilot, took part in a Podrace held at the Tatooinian Mos Espa Grand Arena in 22 BBY with his retrofitted pod, White Panther. A relatively established Podracer, Kador was among names of the competitors' that neophyte bounty hunter Boba Fett could recognize as an appreciator of the sport. The winner of the race had been predetermined by the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure.
Mab Kador appeared on a viewscreen in the young reader novel Boba Fett: Hunted written by Elizabeth Hand and released in 2003.
